Always say no to surrender vote even if there on your nexus! Never stay in fountain if there on your nexus get out there and try! Make sure every spell and item u have is on cool down! Or this game isn't for you.

I never understood surrendering when the enemy is at your gates. Why give them the the satisfaction of winning when they need to fight for it. If your team is staying alive and holding them off, you guys are doing SOMETHING right! They have the power, and they need to use it right.

On the flipside, if the enemy team fought long and hard, coming back from a bad early game or something, why deprive them of a full win all the way down the nexus. I know you've been in the situation where you had a weak laning phase, only to outplay the enemy team with some clever moves. And after that epic fight, when things are just getting good, its always dissheartening to see the surrender text pop up.

PLAY THE GAME
Agreed, this should be the top comment! Getting tired of so many quiters demoralizing their team into defeat.

I've had games, and I kid you not, where our nexus was a hit away and my team had none of their towers down and we rushed out of the respawn base, chase the enemy team away and turn the game around from there. I've won like this on ARAM and Rift so no, I never surrender no matter how grim it looks

um... yeah... yeah you should.... get the games with trolls over with. The point of league is to have fun. Games with trolls are not fun.
Trolls can have a change of heart, if not, play your best til the end just to spite said troll. If they leave, bad mouth you, or anything else, just report and let the tribunal's justice be swift.

Never surrender. I played a game last night where my team was being steamrolled, however, I started building armor pen against the enemy's super tanky team and began causing chaos in our base. The enemy team was unable to pick anyone off and my team kept farming and picking off Champs that wandered too far off. After an hour and four minutes, we came out of top.

Personally, I'm against surrendering in most any occasion because I believe in the idea you can turn some games around by working with your team and giving your all to it. However I cannot abide continuing any game where a champion such as Master Yi or Rengar (just basic examples, though there are others who fit this mentality) gets so many kills in the early game until they are not being fed they are now **self-sufficient**.

When it gets to the point the enemy waits several minutes just to get one guy with their whole team,especially when they could have finished out a while back, then those people are just trying to be rude and basically bully your team you're all weaker than them. *"Such heroic nonsense."* Is what they're thinking of you fighting at that point. Don't give those "decepti-creeps" the satisfaction of an actual win.
Towers don't fall by themselves. If the enemy wants to see my nexus explode, they have to work for it!

Every time I want to let the enemy win when they are hitting the nexus, I always remember my old Soraka game (before her update). All 5 enemies were beginning to hit the Nexus towers, but I came out swinging and managed to get a panta kill, then once my team spawned we pushed down lane and won the game before the enemies respawned. By far my favorite league game I've played.
